title: A Wallet With Built-in Tech!
description: Today's Mystery Video -   Nomad Wallet -   Here is a cool wallet for tech enthusiasts. The Nomad wallet features a built-in battery for charging up your iPhone. It's got enough juice to completely replenish the battery of an iPhone 6 or iPhone 6s.  FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -
